Write-Up Text: From high hopes for an increased focus on poverty in this year's federal budget and an $11 billion funding package for aged care worker pay to concerns about the implications of a possible overhaul of the migration system Australian social media users are engaging in lively discussions about the political landscape of their nation. Some criticize politicians for unrealistically recollecting fairytale budget surplus ambitions while others eagerly anticipate more information on the proposed changes to immigration policy. In all people are keeping a close eye on the latest news and developments that impact their daily lives.
